TopicTitle: Which mod do I have to get rid so my game doesn't crash anymore?

Articles.Content:
Greetings!

The last few days were full of crashes, I had 14 of them. Always when I returned back to the KSC or switched vessels. It would be nice if someone would look into the output_log from the latest crash and tell me which mod keeps crashing my game?

Strange thing is, I am playing with this setup since 0.90 came out and they were updated available. Just the last few days it keeps crashing.

The Output: http://www./view/n629dz9p98skw3q/output_log.txt

KSP-Version: 0.90.x Windows 32-bit, running on W7x64

Mods:

KAS, KAC, Kethane, TextureReplacer, Visual Enhancements from Astronomers pack, Engineer Redux, SCANSat, Distant Objects, Chatterer, StageRecovery, Dust Storms on Duna

The last KSP-related entry (before the stack-trace/dumping stuff added on by Windows) appears to be a Kethane-related message right before the game crashed. Earlier in your log there's also a Unity message about Kethane being incompatible. I don't believe Majiir was released an 0.90-specific build of Kethane so unless someone else has a better suggestion, you might try removing it and seeing how it goes.

Also, you have some texture-read errors in there from EVE (EnvironmentalVisual Enhancements) but those don't look like an obvious culprit. For what it's worth, I don't think EVE has been specifically updated yet either.
Thank you, I will try some things with these two mods.
Please follow the directions in the stickied post.
some where on the kethane thread, there is an unofficial fix for ksp v0.90.0
